targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    Service,
    sum(NumMetrics) as TotalNumMetrics
FROM (
    -- From the sum table
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum
    WHERE $timeFilter
    AND ServiceName in (${service:singlequote})
    AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = ${environment:singlequote}

    GROUP BY Service
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- From the gauge table
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
    WHERE $timeFilter
        AND ServiceName in (${service:singlequote})
        AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = ${environment:singlequote}

    GROUP BY Service
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- From the summary table
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_summary
    WHERE $timeFilter
        AND ServiceName in (${service:singlequote})
        AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = ${environment:singlequote}

    GROUP BY Service
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- From the histogram table
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_histogram
    WHERE $timeFilter
        AND ServiceName in (${service:singlequote})
        AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = ${environment:singlequote}

    GROUP BY Service
) as combined
GROUP BY Service
ORDER BY TotalNumMetrics DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Metrics Collected v2', user='3' */
SELECT
    Service,
    sum(NumMetrics) as TotalNumMetrics
FROM (
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752764653,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752768253,3)
    AND ServiceName in ('ecs','otelcol-contrib')
    AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = 'staging'

    GROUP BY Service
    
    UNION ALL
    
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752764653,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752768253,3)
        AND ServiceName in ('ecs','otelcol-contrib')
        AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = 'staging'

    GROUP BY Service
    
    UNION ALL
    
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_summary
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752764653,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752768253,3)
        AND ServiceName in ('ecs','otelcol-contrib')
        AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = 'staging'

    GROUP BY Service
    
    UNION ALL
    
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(ServiceName) as Service, 
        count(distinct(MetricName)) as NumMetrics 
    FROM base14.otel_metrics_histogram
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752764653,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752768253,3)
        AND ServiceName in ('ecs','otelcol-contrib')
        AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = 'staging'

    GROUP BY Service
) as combined
GROUP BY Service
ORDER BY TotalNumMetrics DESC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    MetricName,
    groupArray(TableName) as Tables
FROM (
    -- From the sum table
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_sum' as TableName
    FROM otel_metrics_sum
    WHERE $timeFilter
    AND ServiceName in (${service:singlequote})
    AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = ${environment:singlequote}

    UNION ALL
    
    -- From the gauge table
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_gauge' as TableName
    FROM otel_metrics_gauge
    WHERE $timeFilter
    AND ServiceName in (${service:singlequote})
    AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = ${environment:singlequote}

    UNION ALL
    
    -- From the summary table
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_summary' as TableName
    FROM otel_metrics_summary
    WHERE $timeFilter
    AND ServiceName in (${service:singlequote})
    AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = ${environment:singlequote}

    UNION ALL
    
    -- From the histogram table
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_histogram' as TableName 
    FROM otel_metrics_histogram
    WHERE $timeFilter
    AND ServiceName in (${service:singlequote})
    AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = ${environment:singlequote}

) as all_metrics
GROUP BY MetricName
ORDER BY MetricName ASC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Metrics Collected v2', user='3' */
SELECT
    MetricName,
    groupArray(TableName) as Tables
FROM (
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_sum' as TableName
    FROM otel_metrics_sum
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752764653,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752768253,3)
    AND ServiceName in ('ecs','otelcol-contrib')
    AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = 'staging'

    UNION ALL
    
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_gauge' as TableName
    FROM otel_metrics_gauge
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752764653,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752768253,3)
    AND ServiceName in ('ecs','otelcol-contrib')
    AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = 'staging'

    UNION ALL
    
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_summary' as TableName
    FROM otel_metrics_summary
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752764653,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752768253,3)
    AND ServiceName in ('ecs','otelcol-contrib')
    AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = 'staging'

    UNION ALL
    
    
    SELECT 
        distinct(MetricName) as MetricName,
        'otel_metrics_histogram' as TableName 
    FROM otel_metrics_histogram
    WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752764653,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752768253,3)
    AND ServiceName in ('ecs','otelcol-contrib')
    AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = 'staging'

) as all_metrics
GROUP BY MetricName
ORDER BY MetricName ASC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Metrics Collected v2', user='3' */


select TimeUnix as EntryTime, * from base14.otel_metrics_sum where TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752764653,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752768253,3)
AND ServiceName in ('ecs','otelcol-contrib')
AND MetricName = 'container.blockio.io_service_bytes_recursive'
AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = 'staging'
order by TimeUnix DESC LIMIT 5

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Metrics Collected v2', user='5' */
SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (30 * 1000)) * (30 * 1000)) as t, avg(Value) FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1753348210,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1753351810,3)
AND ServiceName in ('appstatus/bakasura/proxy','appstatus/bender','appstatus/devops/flower','appstatus/devops/grafana','appstatus/devops/pgadmin','appstatus/devops/sonarqube','appstatus/devops/vault','appstatus/finmo/alb','appstatus/finmo/api','appstatus/finmo/app','appstatus/finmo/bheema','appstatus/finmo/webhooks','appstatus/hg','appstatus/tara','awsfirehose/metrics','github','otelcol-contrib','postgres/app-finmo-db','rabbitmq/app-finmo-rabbitmq','redis/app-finmo-redis')
AND MetricName = 'AWS/ApplicationELB/ActiveConnectionCount'
AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = 'production'
 GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Metrics Collected v2', user='5' */
SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (30 * 1000)) * (30 * 1000)) as t, avg(Value) FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1753348210,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1753351810,3)
AND ServiceName in ('appstatus/bakasura/proxy','appstatus/bender','appstatus/devops/flower','appstatus/devops/grafana','appstatus/devops/pgadmin','appstatus/devops/sonarqube','appstatus/devops/vault','appstatus/finmo/alb','appstatus/finmo/api','appstatus/finmo/app','appstatus/finmo/bheema','appstatus/finmo/webhooks','appstatus/hg','appstatus/tara','awsfirehose/metrics','github','otelcol-contrib','postgres/app-finmo-db','rabbitmq/app-finmo-rabbitmq','redis/app-finmo-redis')
AND MetricName = 'AWS/ApplicationELB/ActiveConnectionCount'
AND ResourceAttributes['environment'] = 'production'
 GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

list.definition:
SELECT distinct ResourceAttributes['environment']
FROM $table 
WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
list.label: Environment
list.name: environment

query.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
query.query:
SELECT distinct ResourceAttributes['environment']
FROM $table 
WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
query.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Metrics Collected v2', user='5' */
SELECT distinct ResourceAttributes['environment']
FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge 
WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT ServiceName
FROM (
	SELECT ServiceName
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum
	WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour

	UNION ALL

	SELECT ServiceName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
	WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour

	UNION ALL

	SELECT ServiceName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_summary
	WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour

	UNION ALL

	SELECT ServiceName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_histogram
	WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
)
ORDER BY ServiceName
list.label: Service
list.name: service

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT MetricName
FROM (
    SELECT MetricName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge 
   	WHERE ServiceName in ($service)
	AND TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
    
	UNION ALL
    
	SELECT MetricName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum
	WHERE ServiceName in ($service)
	AND TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
    
	UNION ALL
    
	SELECT MetricName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_summary
	WHERE ServiceName in ($service)
    AND TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
	
	UNION ALL
    
	SELECT MetricName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_histogram
	WHERE ServiceName in ($service)
	AND TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
) AS all_metrics
ORDER BY MetricName
list.label: Metric
list.name: metricName

SELECT DISTINCT MetricName
FROM (
    SELECT MetricName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge 
   	WHERE ServiceName in ('ecs','otelcol-contrib')
	AND TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
    
	UNION ALL
    
	SELECT MetricName 
	FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum
	WHERE ServiceName in ('ecs','otelcol-contrib')
	AND TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour

	FROM base14.otel_metrics_histogram
	WHERE ServiceName in ('ecs','otelcol-contrib')
	AND TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
) AS all_metrics
ORDER BY MetricName
